question: Không có đủ tiền để trả nợ; phá sản.
example: He’d be bankrupt, and the bank would take his building.
english-definition: Unable to pay what you owe, and having control of your financial matters given, by a court of law, to a person who sells your property to pay your debts.

question: Tuân theo các quy tắc hoặc tiêu chuẩn; tuân thủ.
example: It would seem like he did not want to conform to the city’s codes before the forthcoming inspection.
english-definition: To behave according to the usual standards of behavior that are expected by a group or society.

question: Thuê ai đó làm việc và trả tiền cho họ.
example: But he didn’t have the money whereby he could employ the personnel needed to make the repairs.
english-definition: To have someone work or do a job for you and pay them for it.

question: Buộc ai đó phải rời khỏi một nơi, chẳng hạn như trường học, tổ chức hoặc quốc gia; trục xuất.
example: ...the city will expel everyone.
english-definition: To force someone to leave a school, organization, or country.

question: Việc làm cho một cái gì đó lớn hơn hoặc dài hơn; sự gia hạn (thời gian).
example: He had requested an extension, but it was denied by the city.
english-definition: The fact of making something larger or longer; a period of time by which a deadline is postponed.

question: Sắp xảy ra hoặc sắp xuất hiện; sắp tới.
example: ...before the forthcoming inspection.
english-definition: Happening or coming soon.

question: Cung cấp đồ đạc cho một ngôi nhà hoặc căn phòng.
example: They even furnished some of the apartments with new beds, dressers, and chairs.
english-definition: To put furniture in a house or room.

question: Các điều kiện hoặc thực hành giúp duy trì sức khỏe và ngăn ngừa sự lây lan của bệnh tật; vệ sinh.
example: ...standards for safety and hygiene...
english-definition: Conditions or practices conducive to maintaining health and preventing disease, especially through cleanliness.

question: Sạch sẽ và không có khả năng gây bệnh; hợp vệ sinh.
example: When the deadline of the inspection arrived, the apartment building was hygienic and safe.
english-definition: Clean and unlikely to cause disease.

question: Một người đàn ông (hoặc một công ty) sở hữu và cho thuê nhà, căn hộ, hoặc đất.
example: A kind landlord was afraid that he would lose his apartment building.
english-definition: A man (or a company) who you rent a room, a house, an apartment, or land from.

question: Cho thuê hoặc đi thuê (tài sản) theo một hợp đồng pháp lý.
example: Without tenants to lease the rooms, the landlord would be unable to pay his mortgage.
english-definition: To make a legal agreement by which money is paid in order to use land, a building, a vehicle, or a piece of equipment for an agreed period of time.

question: Được yêu cầu bởi luật pháp hoặc quy tắc; bắt buộc.
example: He needed to make some mandatory repairs to the old building...
english-definition: Required by law or a rule; compulsory.

question: Sửa chữa một thứ gì đó bị hỏng hoặc rách.
example: ...he mended the holes in the floor and walls.
english-definition: To repair something that is broken or damaged.

question: Một thỏa thuận pháp lý mà bạn vay tiền từ ngân hàng hoặc tổ chức tương tự để mua nhà, đất...
example: ...the landlord would be unable to pay his mortgage.
english-definition: A legal agreement by which a bank or similar organization lends you money to buy a house, etc., and you pay the money back over a particular number of years.

question: Những người được tuyển dụng bởi một tổ chức hoặc tham gia vào một công việc cụ thể; nhân sự.
example: ...whereby he could employ the personnel needed to make the repairs.
english-definition: The people who are employed by an organization or who are involved in a particular type of work.

question: Hệ thống các đường ống, bể chứa, vòi... cung cấp nước và dẫn nước thải trong một tòa nhà.
example: He knew a lot about plumbing, so that’s how he helped.
english-definition: The system of pipes, tanks, fittings, and other apparatus required for the water supply, heating, and sanitation in a building.

question: Một người trả tiền thuê để được sống trong một căn phòng, ngôi nhà, v.v. thuộc sở hữu của người khác.
example: ...or his tenants would have to leave by the end of the month.
english-definition: A person who pays rent for the use of a room, a house, etc. owned by someone else.

question: Rất hợp thời trang hoặc cập nhật; thời thượng.
example: His old building now looked like one of the trendiest buildings in town.
english-definition: Very fashionable or up to date.

question: Một dịch vụ (như điện hoặc nước) được cung cấp cho công chúng; sự hữu ích.
example: One tenant had worked for the city’s utilities.
english-definition: A service (such as electricity or water) that is provided for the public; the quality of being useful.

question: Bằng cách nào đó; nhờ đó.
example: But he didn’t have the money whereby he could employ the personnel needed to make the repairs.
english-definition: By which way or method.
